newsitem.title: RUSSIA: Ingosstrakh insures Central Moscow Depositary.
newsitem.headline: Ingosstrakh insures Central Moscow Depositary.

text.p: SAO Ingosstrakh, Russia's second biggest insurance company, has insured one of Russia's biggest independent share registrars and depositaries for property and civil liabilities, Ingosstrakh said on Friday.
Ingosstrakh has insured all Central Moscow Depositary (AO Tsentralny Moskovsky Depozitary in Russian) property, including electronic equipment worth $800,000, Ingosstrakh said in a statement.
Ingosstrakh has also insured the depositary's liabilities with $1 million in payment on each insurance case, it said.
